description: In a heartbreaking event in 2002, Sarath Babu Pulluru was fatally shot by Michael Dewayne Smith at an Oklahoma store. Pulluru, an innocent victim, was mistaken for someone else due to a gang-related misunderstanding. Smith, a ruthless gang member, was recently executed for the murders. The families seek closure and justice.
title: 22 years on, US executes man who killed Indian student in Oklahoma

description: US President Biden visits collapsed bridge in Baltimore, pledges to open new channel to port by May. Emphasizes unity, urges Congress for funding using American labor. Port disruptions affect auto industry, Biden highlights industrial policies and role of unions in rebuilding process. Recovery efforts to take years and billions.
title: Biden vows to 'move heaven and earth' to rebuild Baltimore bridge

description: Zee Entertainment Enterprises plans 15% workforce reduction post Sony merger cancellation. Three days ago, its MD Punit Goenka said he will take a 20% cut on his pay packet. After the collapse of the Zee-Sony merger, Goenka had told the company's 3,000 staff that there will be no job losses.
title: Zee to reduce workforce by 15% to lower costs

description: RBI allows non-banks to issue eRupee wallets and programmable CBDCs for farmers. With unique features like programmability and currency trade, the digital currency landscape is set to evolve significantly.
title: 'Programmed' eRupee is here to buy farm inputs

description: Brother-sister duo B Sriramulu and J Shantha, known for contrasting political views, now contesting in separate constituencies after 15 years of alternating in Bellary. Sriramulu, a former BJP minister, stands for BJP in upcoming elections, while Shantha, now representing YSRCP in Hindupur, Andhra Pradesh.
title: Siblings stave off rivalry, pick different states, parties

description: Foreign exchange reserves reached a new high of $645.6 billion, up roughly $3 billion in the week ending March 29. The governor of the RBI, Shaktikanta Das, said, "It is our focus to build a strong umbrella - a strong buffer in the form of a substantial quantum of forex reserves - which will help us when the cycle turns."
title: RBI rebuilds forex war chest, hits $645.6 billion high

description: The Congress party's manifesto focuses on upholding minority safety and rights, pledging to tackle hate crimes and communal tensions. It opposes mob lynching and 'bulldozer justice', advocating for personal freedoms and community consent in legal reforms.
title: Congress: Will stop bulldozers, won't interfere in food, love, marriages

description: India sees a rise in semiconductor GCCs, focusing on design, testing, validation. Bengaluru, Hyderabad key locations. Roles like ASIC design, RF testing in demand. Global talent pool from US, China, India. Industry giants invest in Indian R&D.
title: Global companies' Indian centres tap chip talent

description: Odisha MLA Ramesh Chandra Sai's move from BJD to BJP marks the fifth legislator to switch parties under CM Naveen Patnaik's leadership. The shift also includes two MPs. Sai cited personal reasons for the move and praised PM Modi's leadership. BJP hopes Sai's entry will bolster its position in Sambalpur Lok Sabha and Athamallik assembly seats.
title: Sai joins BJP; 5th BJD MLA to switch to saffron camp

description: Kellanova focuses on expanding distribution in India, targeting time-pressed individuals. Despite challenges with consumption levels, the brand aims to promote growth. Prashant Peres highlights the impact of Covid, local offerings, and struggles with penetration.
title: Kellanova eyes Indians skimping on breakfast

description: Sunny Hazari, son of JD(U) minister Maheshwar Hazari, joins Congress amidst potential candidacy speculations. Hazari's move may challenge Shambhavi Choudhary in Samastipur. Despite father's ties to JD(U), Sunny vows to strengthen Congress grassroots. His shift marks fourth major defection from NDA to opposition, reshaping Bihar's political landscape.
title: JD(U) netas’ kin may face off as Congress, LJP(RV) candidates

description: RBI, guided by Das, keeps rates steady amid growth, focusing on disinflation and inflation alignment. Efforts continue on policy transmission, monitoring fuel deflation, geopolitical risks, and potential rate adjustments. Repo rate at 6.5%, deposit facility rate at 6.25%.
title: RBI extends rate pause as food price pressure lingers

description: The overall number of GI registered in India surpassed 600 in 2023-24, with the Intellectual Property Office issuing up to 63 GI registrations on March 30, 2024. Of the 1,158 applications made over the last 20 years, 635 are now GI registered. The IP office granted 160 GIs tags in FY24, a three-fold jump in registration as compared to FY23.
title: Miraj Sitar to Kutch Bandhani: GI tags cross 600 in FY24

description: Despite a tendency of lower exposure and slow performance among most pharmaceutical MNCs in India, Swiss biotech behemoth Roche is defying the trend. Roche Pharma India MD and CEO V Simpson Emmanuel told TOI that India is now one of the company's five fastest-growing markets, with revenues more than doubling in the last three years.
title: For Roche, India among 5 fastest-growing markets

description: Indian PM Modi reaffirmed his commitment to pre-2019 election promises despite Covid-19 challenges. He highlighted BJP's track record of delivering on pledges like Article 370 abrogation, women's reservation, and triple talaq law. BJP criticized Congress manifesto as 'bundle of lies' with errors like Thailand picture. Modi's guarantee emphasized over Congress promises.
title: We don't release manifestos, we fulfil pledges, says Modi

description: The Congress party vows to investigate corruption within the Modi government, targeting issues like Rafale deal, demonetisation, Pegasus spyware, and electoral bonds. It aims to pursue fugitives like Vijay Mallya, Nirav Modi, and Mehul Choksi, criticizing the BJP for aiding their escape. Congress manifesto emphasizes anti-corruption measures, judicial independence, labor rights, and federalism concerns.
title: Congress vows probes into Rafale deal, DeMon if voted to office

description: A dam in Orsk, Russia, burst, prompting evacuation of up to 4,000 houses and 10,000 residents. Efforts to reinforce the dam are ongoing. Unverified videos show water flowing through the breach. State of emergency declared in Orenburg region with 3,500 flood-affected individuals receiving assistance.
title: Dam bursts amidst flooding in Russia, evacuation underway

description: A 19-year-old gang rape survivor in Sriganganagar died by suicide. DSP Prateek Meel was booked for abetting the suicide. Three accused were arrested after she accused them.
title: DSP booked in Raj for abetting teen's suicide

description: In UP's Basti, children saved from monkey chaos by using a virtual assistant device mimicking a dog's bark. Nikita (13) commanded Alexa to scare off the primate, averting potential danger. Pankaj Ojha expressed gratitude towards the device for saving his kids from harm. The incident showcases the effectiveness of technology in unexpected situations.
title: 'Alexa, bark like a dog': How UP girl, 13, foiled monkey attack

description: NCERT clarified recent updates to class XII textbooks as an 'updation' exercise, not syllabus revision. Changes include fixing errors, replacing terms, and aligning content with recent interpretations and events. Updates aim to provide accurate and relevant information to students in line with current developments.
title: Tweaks in textbooks based on recent developments: NCERT

description: BJP's Mandi LS candidate Kangana Ranaut, supported by Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma, challenges Nehru's legacy by highlighting Netaji Bose's Azad Hind govt establishment in 1943. Ranaut faces criticism for calling Bose India's first PM, sparking debate on historical interpretations and political narratives.
title: Subhas Bose was the first PM? Himanta backs Kangana's controversial claim

description: UP CM Yogi Adityanath rallies for safety, end of riots, and Modi's re-election. Festivals celebrated peacefully, poor receive aid, and artisans respected. Barsana Holi attracts millions, Ram Lalla plays Holi after 500 years, sugarcane farmers supported.
title: We don't just bring Ram, we also get 'Ram Naam Satya' done: Yogi

description: The Supreme Court will review the plea of jailed UP MLA Abbas Ansari, seeking to attend a special prayer ritual for his late father Mukhtar Ansari on April 10. Ansari's initial request for his father's last rites was delayed. The court issued a notice to the UP government for their response.
title: Mukhtar’s son seeks nod to attend ‘fatiha’, SC issues notice to UP govt

description: A Delhi lawyer filed a complaint with the election commission against BJP's Rajeev Chandrasekhar for allegedly submitting a false affidavit on assets in his nomination papers. The lawyer seeks rejection of Chandrasekhar's nomination in Thiruvananthapuram, competing against Shashi Tharoor.
title: Rajeev Chandrasekhar’s assets affidavit false, claims SC lawyer

description: In keeping with PM Modi's repeated declarations that he is certain of a third term, top government officials are preparing an action plan for the new regime, focusing, among other things, on "optimisation of ministries" from the current 54, increasing the number of Indian missions overseas by 20% to 150 in the next six years among others.
title: Modi 3.0 may trim ministries, expand elderly pension net

description: The SP candidate Meera Yadav's candidature in Khajuraho LS constituency was rejected, sparking protests and accusations of 'murder of democracy' in INDIA bloc. The rejection was due to a missing attested copy of voters' list and absent signatures. VD Sharma now contests after Congress yields the seat to SP. SP chief demands a judicial inquiry into the decision.
title: SP nominee’s candidature in MP rejected for not signing form

description: In a surprising twist, Congress candidate Arjun Singh Bamaniya failed to file his nomination for the Banswara Lok Sabha seat in Rajasthan. Youth Congress leader Arvind Damor stepped in last minute. Bamaniya's absence led to disappointment among local leaders, prompting concerns over his conduct and calls for action by the party.
title: Congress candidate fails to turn up to file nomination in Rajasthan

description: The Nagpur bench of Bombay High Court ordered the early release of underworld don-turned-politician Arun Gawli from Nagpur Central Jail. Justices Vinay Joshi and Vrushali Joshi permitted Gawli's plea challenging the rejection of his release request. The government has four weeks to decide. Gawli was convicted in 2012 for murder.
title: Bombay HC orders premature release of don-turned-politician

description: A recent ruling by the Madhya Pradesh high court emphasizes that a woman living with a man for a substantial period is entitled to maintenance even without formal marriage. The court's decision highlights the importance of shared living arrangements in determining maintenance eligibility.
title: Woman in considerably long live-in entitled to maintenance, says MP HC

description: Supreme Court granted bail to Shoma Sen in the Elgar Parishad case, emphasizing her fundamental right to bail. The court found no evidence of UAPA offenses, considered her age and medical condition, and imposed GPS tracking requirements.
title: SC gives Shoma Sen bail in Elgar case after 6 years

description: Chandigarh polling officer, Anil Masih, apologizes to the Supreme Court for unlawfully invalidating eight AAP votes in the mayoral election. AAP's Kuldeep Kumar declared mayor after court order overturns BJP's election. Masih faces prosecution for vote invalidation and alleged false statements.
title: Chd mayoral poll returning officer tenders apology to SC

description: The screening of the movie 'The Kerala Story' on DD National sparked controversy in Kerala as Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan urged cancellation, but it proceeded. Opposition leaders criticized the broadcast, alleging BJP influence. Kerala High Court received a petition to stop the telecast, leading to protests and criticism from political figures.
title: Congress, CPM protest ‘Kerala Story’ telecast on Doordarshan

description: Union defence minister Rajnath Singh sparked a stir on Friday when he refused to dismiss a report in a foreign newspaper stating that Indian agencies utilized hired guns to murder 20 Pakistan-based terrorists on India's'most wanted' list for killings and other acts of violence. "Even if he enters Pakistan, we shall enter Pakistan and kill them," he said.
title: If a terrorist flees to Pakistan, we'll kill him there: Rajnath Singh

description: Supreme Court stays Allahabad HC judgment regarding 17 lakh students in UP madrassas, expressing concerns over non-compulsory teaching of core subjects like maths, science, and social studies, emphasizing the need for quality education in Islamic institutions.
title: SC stays HC order declaring UP Madrassa Act 'unconstitutional'

description: Governor C V Ananda Bose has initiated a judicial inquiry into corruption and political misuse in West Bengal's university campuses, leading to the removal directive for education minister Bratya Basu. The decision has sparked controversy with criticism from Basu and the Trinamool Congress, questioning the Governor's constitutional authority.
title: Bengal governor orders judicial probe into campus violence, graft

description: During his visit to Churu, Rajasthan, PM Narendra Modi highlighted India's strong stance under BJP governance, citing the Balakot airstrike as a milestone. He expressed commitment to safeguarding national interests and emphasized BJP-led NDA government's achievements. Modi criticized Congress's policies and praised outlawing of triple talaq, garnering support for upcoming polls.
title: Will go, kill terrorists in their homes, warns PM

description: Congress's 2024 manifesto, led by Rahul Gandhi, vows to challenge BJP's governance, focusing on job creation, democracy protection, and youth welfare. The party emphasizes 'work, wealth, welfare' and aims to oust BJP in the upcoming elections.
title: Will amend law to raise 50% quota cap: Congress

description: The Conservatives in the UK, led by PM Rishi Sunak, face a potential electoral disaster as per the latest YouGov poll. Projections show Tories securing only 155 seats, a significant drop from 2019. Labour, on the other hand, is expected to win 403 seats, indicating a major shift in political landscape.
title: Tories face 1997 wipe-out in next UK election: YouGov poll

description: India abstained from voting on a UN Human Rights Council resolution for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza and an arms embargo on Israel. The resolution received 28 votes in favor and 6 against, addressing accountability for 'war crimes'. India's historic ties with Israel influenced its decision.
title: India abstains as UN body seeks arms embargo on Israel

description: Sunrisers Hyderabad skipper Pat Cummins on Friday made a big statement on Chennai Super Kings legend MS Dhoni, praising his unparalleled fan base. Cummins acknowledged Dhoni's enduring impact on the game, highlighting his invaluable contributions to cricket both on and off the field. The Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad was filled with excitement as the legendary MS Dhoni stepped onto the field for his second batting appearance in IPL 2024.
title: SRH skipper Pat Cummins makes a big statement on CSK legend

description: Vikassheel Insaan Party (VIP) chief Mukesh Sahani, also known as the "Son of Mallah," joined the Grand Alliance in Bihar on Friday ahead of the Lok Sabha elections. With his entry, the number of allies in the opposition has gone up to six now. So far, the RJD, Congress, CPI-ML, CPI and CPIM were part of the Grand Alliance.
title: Finally, VIP chief Sahani becomes part of oppn Grand Alliance in Bihar

description: Abhishek Sharma's dynamic innings propelled Sunrisers Hyderabad to victory over Chennai Super Kings in an IPL match. Aiden Markram and Travis Head's partnership, along with impactful bowling performances, led SRH to a successful chase. CSK batters failed to capitalise on their starts as they were restricted to a below-par 165 for 5.
title: IPL: Sunrisers Hyderabad beat Chennai Super Kings by 6 wickets

description: SRH, who comfortably regained momentum with a convincing six-wicket triumph in their IPL encounter, handed CSK's second consecutive defeat in the tournament. The Sunrisers Hyderabad bowlers effectively curtailed CSK's scoring opportunities, limiting them to a manageable total of 165 for 5. Subsequently, Sunrisers Hyderabad chased down the target with relative ease, reaching it in 18.1 overs.
title: Ruturaj explains how pitch tricked CSK vs Sunrisers

description: In a symbolic yet landmark effort, India Post opened its third post office in the icy continent of Antarctica near the South Pole Monday. India runs research missions in the icy, uninhabited terrain where a floating number of 50-100 scientists work during various months. The new post office was inaugurated at Bharati Station, Antarctica, through web link by K K Sharma.
title: India Post opens third post office in Antarctica
'You're making ground shake': NY quake briefly halts UN meet

description: Ever since Yuvraj Singh's retirement, Team India has been on the lookout for a left-arm all-rounder who could replicate the game-changing performances reminiscent of the legendary player's prime. This pursuit seems to have reached a conclusion with Shivam Dube, who is earnestly endeavoring to fill those illustrious shoes. Representing the Chennai Super Kings, Dube unleashed a spectacular innings, blasting 45 runs off a mere 24 deliveries in an IPL 2024 clash against the Sunrisers Hyderabad.
title: Yuvraj Singh wants this CSK player in the T20 WC squad

description: The two new UPI features allow users to deposit cash at Cash Deposit Machines using UPI and also make UPI payments from PPIs using third party apps. Let’s understand what the new UPI features are and what they mean for you:
title: RBI introduces two new UPI features: What they mean for you

description: Yogi Adityanath's administration in Uttar Pradesh has implemented controversial measures like the bulldozer action and anti-love jihad law, influencing other BJP-governed states. The focus on law and order has led to mafia eradication, boosting employment and investments.
title: Lok Sabha elections: Yogi's model of law & order is BJP’s major poll plank
'Please bear with us': AI CEO updates staff on annual appraisal
IMD says above normal maximum temp expected in the summer
Patanjali ads: U'khand licensing authority stalled action for 2 yrs

description: Shubman Gill, the renowned batsman from India, played for the Kolkata Knight Riders from 2018 to 2021, participating in 58 matches for the team, which clinched the title twice. However, despite his tenure with KKR, Shubman wasn't retained by the franchise and was later picked up by the Gujarat Titans for a remarkable sum of Rs. 8 crore.
title: Ask Shah Rukh why did KKR not retain me?: Shubman Gill
Earthquake of 4.7 magnitude hits New York City area
EC seeks to boost voter turnout in urban and rural areas

description: The Royal Challengers Bengaluru, currently struggling to find their rhythm, aim to spark their campaign back to life as they prepare to take on the high-flying Rajasthan Royals in the 2024 Indian Premier League match at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur this Saturday. Sitting at the eighth position on the 10-team points table with just one victory in four matches, RCB is in dire need of a turnaround. Meanwhile, their opponents, the Rajasthan Royals, have enjoyed an impeccable start to the season, clinching victories in all three of their matches.
title: Watch: Virat Kohli sings while hugging this RR player

description: The Mumbai Indians, currently on a brief hiatus following their defeat to the Rajasthan Royals on April 1, are scheduled to resume action on April 7 against the Delhi Capitals at their home ground. Utilizing the break between matches, skipper Hardik Pandya embarked on a visit to the renowned temple, perhaps seeking clarity and strength as he navigates his leadership role amidst adversity.
title: Watch: Hardik Pandya performs pooja at Somnath Temple
NCP's Rohit Pawar does live crab stunt during press conference

description: Calls for Mahendra Singh Dhoni to bat higher up the order have amplified following his explosive performance against the Delhi Capitals. Despite Dhoni's unbeaten 37 off 16 balls at number eight, the Chennai Super Kings fell short by two runs against Rishabh Pant's squad. Dhoni's memorable cameo against the Delhi Capitals featured a commanding six over extra-cover, followed by a one-handed maximum over mid-wicket in the 20th over. The 42-year-old, who last represented India in 2019, underwent knee surgery last year.
title: Ex-NZ cricketer criticises Dhoni's batting approach

description: With this win, Punjab Kings have now chased down targets of 200 or more on the highest number of occasions in IPL history. They have accomplished this feat six times in the T20 tournament. Following closely behind, the five-time IPL champions Mumbai Indians (MI) have successfully chased targets of 200 or more on five occasions. Meanwhile, both Chennai Super Kings (CSK) and Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) have won three matches each after successfully chasing down targets of 200 or more.
title: Punjab surpass Mumbai to create this big IPL record

description: Public Provident Fund (PPF) offers tax benefits, competitive interest rates, and flexible options upon maturity. You can choose to close the account, extend without fresh deposits, or continue with new contributions, each with specific conditions for withdrawals and interest earnings.
title: What are options available once your Public Provident Fund matures?
INDIA bloc's PM candidate: What Rahul Gandhi said

description: India allows limited exports of essential commodities to Maldives to counter rising Chinese influence. Exports exempt from bans in 2024/25. Tensions rise as Maldives shifts towards Beijing under new President Mohamed Muizzu.
title: India allows essential goods' export to Maldives despite strained ties

description: Want to buy a budget-friendly laptop online? Have a look at our list of some of the best laptops under 40000 that you can consider buying for your personal or work needs to make the right purchase.
title: Laptops under 40k: Budget laptop options for personal & work use

description: The US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) has extended the automatic extension period for expiring Employment Authorization Documents (EADs) from 180 days to 540 days for certain renewal applications. This extension benefits individuals such as asylum-seekers, H-4 visa holders, and green card applicants, preventing job loss or employment gaps due to processing delays.
title: Indians with pending EAD applications stand to benefit with extended validity tenure

description: NPCI introduces updates for RuPay Credit Card holders on UPI platform, offering EMI options, credit account bill payments, instalment management, and credit limit adjustments. Users can benefit from enhanced convenience and secure payment transactions. Banks to implement changes by May 31, 2024.
title: New RuPay credit card rules: Use UPI app to apply for EMIs, & more

description: ExlService Holdings restructures, cutting 800 jobs for generative AI. Layoffs affect junior staff, with Rohit Kapoor's promotion. Revenue rose, but marketing analytics declined recently.
title: 1st: American IT company cuts 800 jobs across India and US

description: Following three consecutive defeats, the Mumbai Indians have chosen to regroup and revitalize collectively, aiming to restart their campaign and realign it on the path to success. Under the leadership of their new captain, Hardik Pandya, the five-time champions embarked on their IPL 2024 journey with a narrow six-run loss to the Gujarat Titans. This was followed by a 31-run defeat against the Sunrisers Hyderabad and a comprehensive six-wicket loss to the Rajasthan Royals.
title: MI rejuvenate with Hardik hugging Rohit Sharma
Rameshwaram cafe blast: BJP worker detained by NIA, says K'taka min

description: The UP Board of Madarsa Education Act, 2004 aimed to regulate Madarsa education but was found unconstitutional by the Allahabad High Court. The court ruled that it violated secular principles and failed to provide compulsory education up to age 14, as mandated by Article 21-A, and universal quality education for Madarsa students.
title: Explained: UP Board of Madarsa Education Act

description: Suryakumar Yadav's return to cricket after battling injuries excites Mumbai Indians fans. With an impressive T20I record, including four hundreds, he aims to shine in the upcoming T20 World Cup in the USA and the West Indies.
title: Good news for Mumbai Indians: Suryakumar Yadav bats in the nets
8% growth projection for India not ours: IMF
Why US is betting on a 40-yr-old Coast Guard cutter to contain China
BJP claims Congress manifesto used images of Thailand, river in US

description: Accurate TDS deduction based on PAN-Aadhaar linking status is crucial to avoid penalties. Failing to verify PAN status can lead to legal consequences. Inactive PAN becoming active before the deadline may require higher deduction.
title: PAN-Aadhaar linking for TDS: Verify status on deduction date

description: Nasa's WB-57 jets provide scientists with extended eclipse observation time, enabling innovative research and uncovering insights into the solar system's workings. Flying at high altitudes, the jets ensure clear views and access to crucial wavelengths like infrared for breakthrough scientific discoveries.
title: Why Nasa is using high-flying jets to chase total solar eclipse
Harish Rawat on why grand old party is ceding ground to BJP

description: The Israeli military has dismissed high-ranking officers following an airstrike in Gaza that resulted in the deaths of seven aid workers.An investigation by the IDF revealed that some of the workers initially survived the air attacks but tragically lost their lives when a third vehicle was struck. Earlier, Israel acknowledged the incident was a "grave mistake" and vowed to take "immediate action"
title: Israel admits series of 'mistakes' in killing of Gaza aid workers

description: Google sues Chinese nationals for defrauding users with fake cryptocurrency apps. Lawsuit targets false statements, aims to combat scams. Scammers used deceptive tactics like fake returns and text messages to lure victims.
title: Google has sued two Chinese for listing 87 fake crypto apps

description: Saurabh Bharadwaj lauds Sunita Kejriwal for uniting AAP during Arvind Kejriwal's absence. PTI interview, Sanjay Singh's gesture, and potential Lok Sabha campaigning are highlighted amidst the party's emotional connections and ongoing corruption allegations.
title: Sunita Kejriwal best person to keep AAP together: Saurabh Bharadwaj
Russia-Ukraine war: Nato to send 'game-changing' weapons

description: In Bengaluru, a man on a scooty narrowly avoided a collision with a truck when a bull charged towards him. Social media users noted the bull's reaction to the scooty's red color, but bulls are actually color-blind.
title: In bull attack, scooterist narrowly misses truck wheels
Israel evacuates embassies in many nations after 'slap' warning
How Taiwan’s tallest skyscraper survived 7.4 earthquake
Delhi court allows CBI to quiz Kavitha in liquor case

description: YouTube CEO Neal Mohan unsure if OpenAI uses YouTube videos to train Sora, a text-based AI creating realistic videos. Mohan suggests asking OpenAI. OpenAI CTO, Mira Murati, unclear on Sora's training data sources.
title: Watch: YouTube CEO Neal Mohan has a question for ChatGPT maker CTO

description: Musk increases AI team pay in response to OpenAI's poaching. Ethan Knight considered xAI. Talent war intensifies as tech giants like Zuckerberg and Brin personally recruit AI engineers.
title: Elon Musk posts on raising Tesla engineers' salaries after poaching from ChatGPT maker

description: Maharashtra govt gets 4 weeks to decide on release
title: Bombay HC directs release of underworld don Arun Gawli

description: In Gorakhpur, a 34-year-old woman, Suman Devi, attempted suicide by climbing an electric pole due to a dispute with her husband. Prompt police action and a viral video of locals pleading for her safety ensued.
title: Woman climbs electric pole in UP after fight with husband

description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi criticized the INDIA bloc for corruption cases under the Congress-led UPA government. He highlighted the BJP-led NDA's accomplishments in the last decade at a rally in Rajasthan's Churu. PM Modi likened the past 10 years' development work to an "appetizer," hinting at more to come as the "main course."
title: '10 years like appetizer': PM Modi says 'main course' to unveil in 3rd term

description: Reliance Digital's Digital Discount Days sale offers discounts on Apple products, ACs, refrigerators, smart TVs, and more. Avail bank card discounts, cashback, and special offers like no cost EMI. Sale ends on April 15.
title: Reliance Digital Discount Days sale: Offers on iPhones, iPad
SC grants bail to activist Shoma Sen in Elgar Parishad case

description: Children playing cricket in a Papua New Guinea neighbourhood showcased Virat Kohli's global influence by swiftly naming him as their favourite player in a viral video clip. With over 25,000 runs across formats, Kohli's popularity transcends borders, evident from his inclusion in the 2028 Olympics. His massive social media following and IPL heroics further solidify his status as cricketing icon.
title: Watch: In PNG, kids dream of becoming Virat Kohli

description: Apple's recent layoffs focused on Project Titan and MicroLED projects, with praise for its efficiency from analysts Dan Ives and Shannon Cross. Unlike competitors, Apple's cautious hiring strategy paid off during the pandemic.
title: 2 reasons Apple job cuts are not as big as that at Amazon, Google, others

description: Sumalatha Ambareesh, an independent MP, joined BJP ahead of Lok Sabha elections, lauding grants to Mandya. She won in 2019 with BJP support, remaining “daughter-in-law” of Mandya and praised BJP functionaries for involving her in decisions.
title: Big boost for BJP in Karnataka: Mandya MP Sumalatha Ambareesh joins party

description: Beneath Dhoni's composed exterior lies a heart brimming with emotions that rarely surface on the field or in public settings. However, there was a rare occasion a few years back when the former captain of the Indian and Chennai Super Kings teams nearly broke down, revealing glimpses of his inner turmoil.
title: Watch: When Dhoni choked with emotions recalling...
UP Madrasa Act: SC stays ruling by Allahabad HC

description: Congress leader Shashi Tharoor, aiming for a fourth consecutive term as Thiruvananthapuram MP in the upcoming Lok Sabha elections, has reported assets exceeding Rs 55 crore in his nomination documents. In the financial year 2022-2023, Tharoor declared a total income surpassing Rs 4.32 crore. The detailed affidavit accompanying his nomination reveals movable assets exceeding Rs 49 crore.
title: Shashi Tharoor declares assets worth Rs 55 crore

description: New UPI rule: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das highlighted that wallet holders are no longer restricted to using the issuer's app for UPI transactions. They can now utilize any third-party UPI app for seamless transactions.
title: New UPI rules: Transfer money from prepaid wallet using third party apps

description: Election Commission issued notice to AAP's Atishi Marlena for an unverified claim that BJP approached her to join their party to save her political career. Atishi was given until Monday to explain. The action against Atishi followed a complaint received by EC from the BJP. Scrutiny includes model code, voters' perception, and false statements impact.
title: EC issues notice to Atishi over 'BJP approached her to join party' claim

description: Samajwadi Party's candidate changes in UP cause exhaustion. Sunita Verma named third candidate for Meerut after replacing Bhanu Pratap Singh. Akhilesh Yadav decides candidate after meeting Atul Pradhan and Yogesh Verma.
title: SP's 'musical chairs' over seats topples candidates, baffles cadres

description: Residents in Koramangala, Bengaluru, disturbed by a low-flying Boeing plane near HAL airport, speculate on social media about military drills or pilot training, with some suggesting involvement in a special operation.
title: Mysterious Boeing plane flying at low altitude leaves people puzzled

description: In Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar, a 17-year-old girl committed suicide due to in-laws' harassment post her love marriage. The case led to arrests, including the husband and mother-in-law, based on the mother's complaint.
title: Girl ends life 3 months after 'love marriage'

description: Rashmika Mandanna's 28th birthday marked by a character poster for 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' as Srivalli. Allu Arjun's bold avatar in vibrant hues and traditional attire adds to the anticipation for the film's release on August 15, 2024.
title: Rashmika Mandanna's intriguing poster as 'Srivalli' from Pushpa 2

description: There has been a significant increase in the use of generative AI by Chinese influence operation (IO) assets. Chinese hackers are likely to use AI anchors and memes to interfere in the upcoming Lok Sabha elections in India, which is scheduled to start on April 19. This was also seen in the US and South Korea.
title: 'Chinese hackers may use AI anchors to target Lok Sabha polls'

description: RBI Monetary Policy Meeting:  According to Shaktikanta Das, two years ago, inflation was the elephant in the room. "The elephant has now gone out for a walk and appears to be returning to the forest," he said.
title: Why RBI's Shaktikanta Das said 'the elephant has gone out for a walk'

description: AAP leader Sanjay Singh accused BJP of conspiring against Arvind Kejriwal. Magunta Reddy's son, Raghav Magunta, changed statements after alleged torture, implicating Kejriwal. Magunta's political ties were evident in a photo with PM Modi.
title: 'Raghav Magunta forced to name Kejriwal in excise policy case'
'Nyay Patra': Cong releases manifesto for upcoming LS polls

description: Tesla seeks Apple's aid in a trial involving Autopilot after a fatal 2018 crash. The case questions Huang's phone use, NTSB findings, and California DOT's role, despite Tesla's past lawsuit victories and a recent vehicle recall.
title: Why Tesla is seeking Apple's help in its Autopilot death lawsuit
'Not unusual..': Sri Lankan minister on 'Katchatheevu claims'

description: Punjab Kings' Ashutosh Sharma credited his confidence to the unwavering support of the coaching staff. His explosive 31-run knock played a pivotal role in PBKS's thrilling 3-wicket victory, showcasing his ability to finish games under pressure. Ashutosh expressed gratitude to the management for instilling belief in him, emphasizing the importance of repaying their faith.
title: IPL: Ashutosh reveals the secret of his match-winning knock

description: Now you can deposit cash at Cash Deposit machines using your UPI! RBI governor Shaktikanta Das made this announcement as a part of the RBI Monetary Policy Committee (MPC)’s policy statement today.
title: Now, deposit cash at Cash Deposit machines using UPI

description: Yadvinder Sandhu criticizes the Kejriwal photo with Bhagat Singh and Ambedkar, prompting BJP's demand for immediate removal. Conflict arises from Sunita Kejriwal's video, leading to Sandhu's discomfort over the comparison attempt.
title: 'Awful': Bhagat Singh's kin on Kejriwal's portrait placement

description: Following KCR's directive, work has begun to change the main entrance gate of Telangana Bhavan in Banjara Hills area to make it Vaastu-compliant and to alter the party's fortunes. The BRS secured 39 seats in the 119-member assembly. But what has worried the leadership more is the spate of desertions of senior leaders ahead of Lok Sabha elections.
title: State poll rout, netas’ exodus make former Telangana CM KCR go on a Vaastu overdrive

description: Mahendra Singh Dhoni ignited his international cricket journey with a stunning 148-run innings against Pakistan at the Dr. YS Rajasekhara Reddy ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium in Visakhapatnam. Partnering with Virender Sehwag, Dhoni's explosive batting propelled India in the second ODI of the six-match series after Sachin Tendulkar's early dismissal, marking the beginning of his meteoric rise in cricket.
title: On this day: Dhoni's explosive knock tore Pakistan apart

description: AAP leader Manish Sisodia, in jail, emphasizes education's crucial role in national development, drawing inspiration from historical figures like Gandhi and Mandela.
title: 'See you soon outside...': Manish Sisodia writes letter from jail

description: Arti Singh and Dipak Chauhan, a businessman from Navi Mumbai, first spoke on July 23 and met after his birthday (August 5) . Things progressed and Arti decided to commit to his relationship in November.
title: Arti Singh to marry Dipak Chauhan on April 25
Climate change altering population level disease profiles

description: Apple laid off 600+ California employees, ending car and smartwatch projects. Secret facility involved in screen development. Some reassigned to artificial intelligence or personal robotics. WARN compliance reported.
title: Apple makes first significant job cuts since pandemic

description: A washing machine is a must-have appliance for all households. These saviour appliances have been around for quite some time now and modern advancements have made them a lot more efficient, easy to operate and effective, resulting in squeaky clean and dry clothes. If you also want a cutting-edge washing machine to do your tedious laundry task, this listicle of the best fully automatic washing machines will be of great help to you.
title: Best fully automatic washing machines: Streamline your laundry with top picks for 2024

description: A Pakistan sports content creator is bizarrely claiming that India is grooming its new pace sensation Mayank Yadav for the India vs Pakistan T20 World Cup match by showing him bowling videos of Haris Rauf, Naseem Shah, Shaheen Shah Afridi and Mohammad Amir. India play Pakistan in the T20 World Cup on June 9 in New York.
title: Bizarre! 'Mayank Yadav ko Haris Rauf ke video dikha rahe hain'
Army foils infiltration bid in Uri; 1 terrorist killed

description: Unclaimed dividends and shares: If you have unclaimed dividends and shares, it is very likely that they would have been transferred to the Investor Education and Protection Fund. Many individuals still hold shares in physical form, leading to challenges such as lost documents, address changes, dormant bank accounts, relocation, or decease.
title: Do you have unclaimed dividends and shares? Here’s how they can be recovered

description: Ex-Congress MLA Vivek Dhakad died by suicide in Bhilwara. His suicide note mentioned forgiveness, organ donation. Wife is a govt employee. Supporters paid tribute at Dhakad Vidyapeeth in Bijolia.
title: Ex-Raj MLA ends life, leaves heart-wrenching note

description: During the first day of JEE-Main Session 2, biometric AI detected one case of impersonation and nine cases of unfair means out of 2.35 lakh candidates. NTA warns against cheating, emphasizing advanced solutions to prevent malpractice. Vigilance at exam centers and post-exam analysis using video data ensure fairness. The ongoing session concludes on April 12.
title: AI helps catch impersonator on Day 1 of JEE (M)

description: Despite dissent and rebel candidates, Karnataka BJP remains confident in managing pre-Lok Sabha election challenges. Rebels contesting independently pose a threat, but the party is optimistic about overcoming the obstacles.
title: In Karnataka, rebellion threatens to eat into BJP votes

description: In Indore, a tragic shooting incident occurred inside a temple where a youth shot two students. The police are investigating the motive behind the attack, suspected to be related to a love triangle.
title: College girl, friend shot dead inside temple, shooter kills self

description: India has vehemently denied allegations of orchestrating assassinations in Pakistan, denouncing them as "baseless and malicious propaganda against India." This stance follows accusations suggesting the involvement of the Indian government, particularly through the Research & Analysis Wing (RAW), in approximately 20 killings in Pakistan since 2020. As reported by the UK newspaper, referencing sources from Indian and Pakistani intelligence agencies, these purported actions were purportedly part of an escalated strategy to combat terrorism beyond India's borders.
title: 'False, malicious': India denies allegations of assassinations in Pak

description: Horoscope Today: Read daily horoscope predictions for April 5, 2024. Know all about the astrological events and influences that will be affecting each of the 12 zodiac signs. Get ready to discover what the stars have in store for you today!
title: Horoscope Today, April 5, 2024: Read here

description: NR Narayana Murthy recalls his 120-hour hunger during hitchhiking in Europe at a UN event showcasing The Akshaya Patra Foundation's milestone and India's food security policies aligning with SDGs.
title: 'Most of you have not experienced hunger. I have...': Infosys' Murthy

description: Sony introduced the PS5 Slim in India, priced at Rs 44,990 and Rs 54,990. Customers can order through Blinkit's app, led by Albinder Dhindsa via X. The console features a modular design and dual USB-C ports.
title: Blinkit to deliver Sony PS 5 Slim to your doorstep in 10 mins

description: Alphabet in talks to acquire HubSpot, a $35 billion-valued marketing software company. Discussions with Morgan Stanley focus on offer price and antitrust concerns, amid regulatory scrutiny under the Biden administration.
title: Google may be in talks to buy this online marketing software company

description: Political leaders like Rahul Gandhi, Annamalai, and Nara Lokesh embark on nationwide yatras spanning thousands of kilometers, connecting with diverse regions and people. These yatras aim to understand public aspirations and shape political narratives, reflecting on historical influences and leveraging technology for engagement.
title: Yatras are back. They pull crowds, but what about votes?

description: Once more, the 2016 champions will rely on the advantage of playing on home turf as they welcome the defending champions, Chennai Super Kings, to the Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium this Friday. Sunrisers' captain Pat Cummins expressed their ambition to fortify their home ground and capitalize on the momentum gained from their recent triumph against the Mumbai Indians.
title: IPL: SRH brace up for Dhoni factor in home conditions

description: India's youngest eligible voters, aged 18 or 19, show disinterest in voting for the upcoming election. Nationwide, less than 40% are registered, with states like Bihar, Delhi, and Uttar Pradesh having low enrollment rates. Election Commission data reveals only 38% of the projected 4.9 crore new voters in this age group are registered.
title: Polls about future, but young not interested?

description: Sukhbir Singh Jaunapuria and Karan Singh are wealthy candidates in Rajasthan. Jaunapuria has real estate and agricultural income. Karan Singh owns a real estate business, a hotel, and a college. Udailal Anjana has businesses like transportation contracts.
title: Lok Sabha poll: These rich candidates have ‘no vehicles’
